author: jaaf
title: Decentralize Impact
description: The startup ecosystem gets high retention rates of the projects-to-be incubated with a lack of orientation to Cardano solutions in N-A.

f6_assessments.q0: The impact section is presented quite fully, the issues posed are also stated quite clearly. Proposer shows the challenge and also shows how this project solves that challenge. Ho also shows how the project will work and its characteristics. In addition, the founder also clearly stated the risks and had a plan to overcome. This is a good point because it shows that the whole family worked hard to plan the plan in detail.
f6_assessments.q1: The tasks are planned quite clearly on a monthly basis, which will make it easier for voters and the whole team to keep track of the tasks that need to be completed. This is a pretty scientific presentation. In addition, the members of the group are also presented clearly and easily for everyone to refer to and follow during the reading of the proposal. However, the section 'a detailed budget breakdown' should be presented in more detail, the proposer can further list out what else is included in the major tasks.
f6_assessments.q2: For 'Auditablity' section, proposer writes it wuite good. It shows the goal clearly with the number. This point give a clear information to voters understand what the project's goal is. Moreover, it also is a clear measurement for success that voters want to see to jugde this proposal. However, if there are more statistic in the second part, the proposal will be clearer and more transparent.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposer already mentioned  clearly about the ways how solutions can address challenges. The expression ways of the proposer can lead audience to understand that solutions will be solved step by steps, from foundation phase up to fund allocation.  . The strategy of proposal is suitable to contribute in addressing challenges. Ideas of implementation is mentioned to let readers understand easily about approach as well as more convincing. 
I would like to deduct one point in this proposal relating to explanation of key metrics. The proposer can write them down in details with expected quantitative data to make all audiences catch them easier as mostly, the roadmap is relating to the incubation.
Risk management is considered well by the proposer in terms of mentioning on both internal and external risk. By the itemized risk, the proposer can minimize the risks might happened to ensure project be achieved. 
Although the challenge focuses on spreading Cardano in different regions, the proposer has not mentioned about how the influences of this project to Cardano system, although they set the KPI of Proposal regardings to Grow Africa, Grow Cardano Challenge . Proposer can add more information of this matter in the proposal..
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer worked very well in this part with careful considerations on knowledge and skills of necessary human resources, detailed break-down budget and practical timeline. 
Regardings to the timeline, the proposer thinks thoroughly on what they are going to do in the first 6 months, from finding potential candidates until announcement of the winner. To follow this roadmap, the proposer also consider to make a team of experienced people in various sectors, that ensure the transparency and accuracy from the guiding steps to awarding the excellent one. All these key persons have practical experiences which will ensure the feasibility of the incubation. 
Budget is breakdown in detailed with itemizing amount in each activities. The amount is not too big with the scale of competition and first mentoring period to let the incubation happen. With the appropriate amount of money, the proposer can ensure that the proposal will be done in such a efficiency manner.
f6_assessments.q2:
As mentioned in the impact part, the proposal focuses on the incubation process mostly. So, in the proposal, it will be the best documents to audiences if putting both metrics for the incubation and long terms metrics on how this proposal’s implementation contribute to Cardano ecosystem. The proposer can put more information about the metrics for incubation
The proposer already set the clear goals for this proposal with number of teams as well as their expectations.  And the proposer tends to get the fund from others projects in this time as it is entirely new ones, to create new mindset, set the foundation and empower the existing ecosystem.

f6_assessments.q0: Because the startup ecosystem in North Africa has a high retention rate of projects-to-be-incubated due to a lack of orientation to Cardano solutions, the proposer seeks to raise awareness of the opportunities Cardano offers to North Africa by incorporating a decentralized governance experience into an incubation program in this proposal. This program aims to connect its goals with those of Cardano's project Catalyst in order to focus resources and efforts on Cardano promotion as the phases progress. At least three teams of participants will have transformed their business ideas into a viable and scalable business model by the end of the program, as well as been guided in finding the appropriate investment through decentralized funding, exposing them to the new digital economy model and thus to numerous opportunities for business and technical development. Users can join the Catalyst ecosystem and so be linked with the Cardano blockchain as a result of this.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer has the requisite expertise to carry out the project within the financial constraints, which are reasonable.
The squad that has been recommended has shown promise.
The proposal also includes a detailed implementation plan as well as a list of probable implementation obstacles.
As a result, given the skills and plan presented, this idea has a high chance of being implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer provides metrics to be used. They see their success to be when at least 3 teams of participants to put their business ideas into a realizable business model and find the proper investment through decentralized funding guiding them to the new model of the digital economy. At the end of the day, their goal is to create a new mindset, to set the foundation for a new perception of governance and entrepreneurship based on decentralization and to empower the existing ecosystem. This information is hence sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

solution: Building awareness on the opportunities Cardano offer to North Africa by a decentralized governance experience through an incubation program
experience: Backgrounds in audit, consulting, business & IT development, and project piloting to assist international as well as national organizations in their digital transformation, innovation, and technical development in favor of decentralization through blockchain technology.
